turns.content: What are some unique gift ideas for a friend's birthday and where can I find them?

1. Customized Photo Album - Search for custom photo album makers like Shutterfly, Mixbook, or Artifact Uprising.

2. Personalized Coasters - You can buy personalized coasters on Etsy, Personalization Mall, or Amazon.

3. Subscription Box - Look for a subscription box that matches your friend's interest, for example, Birchbox for beauty products, loot crate for gaming, or FabFitFun for lifestyle products.

4. DIY Kit - Find DIY kits on Etsy, Amazon, or Blick Art Materials.

5. Customized Candle - Check out Etsy, Personalization Mall, or My Photo for personalized candles.

6. Personalized Jewelry - You can find personalized jewelry on websites like Etsy or Zales.

7. A unique book - Look for unique books on websites like Powell's, Books-A-Million, or Strand.

8. A plant as a gift - You can buy plants from The Sill, BloomThat, or Costa Farms.

9. A day pass to a local adventure park - Find adventure parks at the U.S. National Whitewater Center, Zip World, or TreeGo.

10. Customized T-Shirt - Check out Custom Ink, Spreadshirt, or Vistaprint for customized t-shirts.
I really like the idea of a customized candle! Do you have any recommendations on scents or where I can find unique options?

Yes, there are several places where you can find unique customized candle options. Here are some scent ideas and websites you can consider:

1. Customized Candle Co. - They allow customers to blend their own scents or choose from their pre-made combinations.

2. Candle Delirium - They have a wide variety of unique scents, including whiskey, campfire, and even bacon.

3. Homesick Candles - Their candles are inspired by different states and cities, and each one has a unique scent profile.

4. Paddywax - They have a wide range of scents with unique packaging, including recycled wine bottle containers, concrete jars, and even concrete vessels with geometric shapes.

5. Brooklyn Candle Studio - They have an array of enticing scents, including cypress, pomelo, and bergamot. 

Remember that different people have different preferences. You can consider the person's personality or interests when selecting a scent or combination.
I think I'll go with the Homesick Candle inspired by my friend's home state. Do you have any tips on how to personalize the candle even more?

Sure, there are a few ways you can personalize the Homesick Candle even more:

1. Add a personal note or message - You can include a heartfelt note, a funny memory that you share with your friend, or a meaningful quote on a card or tag that comes with the candle. 2. Get a custom label - Some candle companies, including Homesick Candles, offer the option to customize the label. You can add your friend's name or initials, a photo of you both, or a special date. 3. Collage on the candle jar – You can add photos or words printed from a printer highlighting your friend's memories or favourite activities with you that stick around the jar, so your friend enjoys looking at the memories you share every time they light a candle. 4. Gift wrap the candle - You can wrap the candle in a unique, personalized gift wrap or create a DIY gift box that includes other treats you know your friend loves. 5. Make a playlist - Curate a playlist of songs that represent your friendship with your friend and add in the gift box or gift card. By doing any or a combination of these tips, you can make the Homesick Candle even more special and memorable.
I love the idea of creating a playlist! What other items could I add to the gift box that would pair well with the personalized candle?

Great question! Here are some items you can add to the gift box that will pair well with the personalized candle:

1. Matchbooks - A pack of personalized or unique matches can complement the candle, complete with quirky or playful messages printed on its box or cover.

2. Bath Salts - You can add a jar of luxurious bath salts, which can create a relaxing bath experience for your friend.

3. Personalized Mug - Consider buying a personalized mug with your friend's name, photo or favorite quote; you can add some hot chocolate mix or tea bags to make the gift box even more cozy.

4. Chocolate or Snacks - You can never go wrong with food! Choose your friend's favorite snacks or treat them to premium chocolate or candy that they might not usually buy for themselves.

5. Personalized coasters - Add some unique coasters, shaped or printed with pictures that mean something to you both.

6. Scented Soaps - Scented soaps and lotions, especially products with complementary fragrances, can complement the candle.

7. A soft, cozy blanket or throw pillow - Adding a soft, cozy blanket, pillow, or even a plush cushion can be a perfect addition, especially if your friend is a home decor enthusiast.

By adding one or more of these items on the gift box, you make it into a personalized and thoughtful gift!
I really like the idea of adding some personalized coasters to the gift box. Do you have any recommendations on where I can find unique ones?

Of course! Here are some recommendations on where you can find unique personalized coasters:

1. Etsy - Etsy has a wide selection of personalized coasters, with various designs and materials, such as wood, acrylic, and cork.

2. Minted - Minted offers a range of personalized coasters that are artistic and stylish, made from high-quality paper or pulpboard material.

3. Personalization Mall - This website offers coasters that can be personalized with names, initials, photos or quotes. They also have coasters made out of slate, marble or wood.

4. Shutterfly - Shutterfly provides personalizing options for coasters with high-quality photos; they also offer custom coasters that can be printed with different eye-catching designs.

5. Zazzle - Zazzle offers a variety of coaster designs, including personalized ones with photos, names, and monograms, as well as other themes such as beach, floral, or vintage.

These websites offer different materials, designs, and personalization options for coasters; you can choose what suits your friend's style and preferences.
I think I'll go with the slate coasters from Personalization Mall since they'll match nicely with my friend's decor. What else do you suggest I add to the gift box?

Great choice! Here are some more suggestions for what else you can add to the gift box:

1. A book - Consider adding a book that you think your friend will enjoy, or you can go for something like a travel guide if your friend loves travelling. 2. A scented candle - Add another scented candle or multiple candles in complementing fragrances, its scent and appearance might vary from the one you selected for your friend. 3. A decorative tray - Put together a decorative tray, such as marble, wood, or mirrored tray that your friend can use in different ways. 4. A personalized card or artwork - Personalize a card or create a small piece of artwork and write a message that's meaningful and heartfelt to your friend. 5. A makeup or grooming kit - Get a grooming, skincare or a makeup kit that your friend can use and is specific to their preferences. 6. A Coffee Table Book - You can add a coffee table book that has beautiful images or artwork. It will also serve as an ideal conversation starter and be an excellent aesthetic addition to your friend's living space. 7. A keepsake box - A personalized keepsake box, such as a wooden chest or a tin, can hold multiple small items such as jewelry, accessories or sentimental items. Remember, the goal is to personalize the gift box and fill it with items that will delight and surprise your friend. You can try pairing different items together to create a cohesive theme or focus on your friend's interests or personality in your gift selection.
